Culture is a very important part of our national identity! #PDC # FH2012
I think we have to block the price of gasoline for three months, and then put in place the floating TIPP. #PDC # FH2012
I receive the attacks with resistance and serenity. #PDC # FH2012
To attack an independent journalist because she is my partner? There is a principle in life, it is to be elegant. #PDC
IF I am the next President, my first duty will be to gather. #PDC # FH2012
Every 2 hours, a farm disappears in France. #PDC # FH2012
I propose a contract between producers and distributors for the prices to be respected. #Agriculture #PDC # FH2012
We can not, in a period of unemployment, encourage large companies to use overtime. #PDC # FH2012
On the other hand, for companies with fewer than 20 employees, the current law on overtime will continue. #PDC # FH2012
We have not put all means at the service of job seekers. #PDC # FH2012
I will create the generation contract: http://t.co/aD043zvg #PDC # FH2012
Yes, there will be a strict limitation of the plurality of mandates: a parliamentarian can no longer have a local executive mandate. #PDC # FH2012
I propose that the judges of the prosecution be appointed as the magistrates of the seat: by the higher council of the magistrature. #PDC # FH2012
My first action in education will be to restore the initial training of teachers. #PDC # FH2012
The international community should pressure the Syrian regime to stop the killing (cont) http://t.co/hoVh8wWn
We must move towards the reform of dependency. #PDC # FH2012
To ensure the 5th risk, we will have to call for national solidarity. #PDC # FH2012
We must do everything possible to keep the elderly person as long as possible at home. #PDC # FH2012
On the autonomy of the Universities, it was a good principle. On the other hand, it will be necessary to change the governance. #PDC # FH2012
I am not in a personal confrontation with N. Sarkozy. #PDC # FH2012
I submitted 60 proposals, and it is on this basis that I appear before the French. #PDC # FH2012
A presidential election is played in the first round. April 21, 2002 remains in my memory. #PDC # FH2012
I want to be first myself, I do not have to be in a role. #PDC # FH2012
Those who will vote for my candidacy will allow the change! #PDC # FH2012
I took exactly the same growth forecasts as the government. #PDC # FH2012
I will increase the back to school allowance by 25% as of 2012. #PDC # FH2012
Capital income must be taxed in the same way as income from work. #PDC # FH2012
For income of more than one million euros a year, the tax rate will be 75%. #PDC # FH2012
Europe is our future, provided it is reoriented. #PDC # FH2012
We must help innovate, invent, be in the "high end" not to compete. #PDC # FH2012
Find my proposal for a law on safeguarding our industry: http://t.co/ZdhHXsr2 #PDC # FH2012
On business, I have a simple rule: justice, all justice. #PDC # FH2012
The public investment bank will support our industrial projects. #PDC # FH2012
We will fight against the medical deserts: http://t.co/hHzBZGH0 #PDC # FH2012
I will come back to a VAT at 5.5% for all cultural goods. #PDC # FH2012
I pledge the right to vote for foreigners in local elections. #PDC # FH2012
I will announce to our allies, in May in Chicago, that we will withdraw at the end of 2012 our troops from Afghanistan. #PDC # FH2012
We will return to the balance of the public accounts at the end of 2017. #PDC # FH2012
We need to diversify our sources of energy. #PDC # FH2012

What is inadmissible in naturalization is arbitrariness. #RTL # FH2012
There is not enough palliative care in France. #RTL # FH2012

To serve France is also to move Europe forward. #London # FH2012

We will have at heart to restore the cultural presence of France abroad. #London # FH2012
The left must be at the rendezvous of France. #London # FH2012
I want to bring you to victory, that of France gathered together. #London # FH2012

I sympathize with the families of the deceased soldiers in service to the people of Guatemala, my condolences, may God strengthen them.
Since we enacted the 6-month post-natal law, in October of last year, 30,000 women have received this benefit.
This law extended from 3 to 6 months postnatal and extended one of every 3, to all working women this benefit.
The new postnatal makes it easier to combine work with motherhood and family and will encourage birth in our country.
In addition, far from harming women's employment, it has strengthened it, as evidenced by the great creation of jobs for women.
Without a doubt, after so many years of waiting, children and women deserved it.
